heading: Boundary disputes.
general-note: Here are entered works on boundary disputes in general. Works on boundary disputes in specific regions, countries, etc. are entered under the name of the place with the subdivision. Boundaries,. e.g.. Latin America--Boundaries.. Works on boundary disputes between two countries, etc. are entered under the name of each country with the subdivision. Boundaries--[other country],. e.g.. United States--Boundaries--Mexico; Mexico--Boundaries--United States..
